text: Jeffrey Boborol Galero (born 15 November 1990) is a Filipino professional boxer who challenged for the WBC mini-flyweight title in 2015. ==Professional career== Galero challenged for his first world title on February 5, 2015, against WBC mini-flyweight champion Wanheng Menayothin, but lost by unanimous decision. == Professional boxing record == {|class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;
